thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pinkmoongirl
title: Great hotel
text: Right in the perfect location! Opposite the TKTS ticket booth for discount broadway shows. Close to restaurants and subway. Rooms were clean and roomy. Staff is wonderful with going out of their way to help. Concierge service to help you find your way. Great buffet breakfast! I love this hotel!
